summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 BRITAX MARATHON 70 SAFETY SEAT, MODEL: E98811A (NA). THE SEAT WAS MANUFACTURED IN MAY OF 2012. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE PADDING IN THE SAFETY SEAT WAS DETERIORATING. THE SAFETY SEAT WAS BEING UTILIZED IN A 2017 HYUNDAI SANTA FE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE FAILURE WAS GRADUALLY GETTING WORSE. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE AND INFORMED THE CONTACT THAT THEY WOULD NOT REPLACE THE INSULATION. THE PURCHASE DATE WAS UNKNOWN.
